annotations:
DEAR ALL,
KINDLY PROPOSE TONNAGE/ORDERS FOR OUR CARGO/VSL BELOW.
MV
XIN YI HAI  16, DWT 56 - OPEN VIZAG, INDIA 20-21 AUGUST - REF MIKKEL
CRANE NO 1 NOT WORKING
ETA SINGAPORE 25/30 AUGUST
ETA SAFR 3/5 SEPTEMBER
BUNKERS: 450 MT VLSFO + 35 MT VLSFO
LAST CARGO : PETCOKE(LAST), SULPHUR,  STEELS, NICKEL ORE,STEEL CARGO,IRON ORE,AGGREGATE.
PREFER TRIP TO CONT/MED/RED SEA
GOA - OK, ABT 80K FOR PASSING
SUDAN & DJIBOUTI - OK
CAN DO ANY DIRTY INCL NICKEL ORE
3 STARS RIGHTSHIP
CAN DO PERIOD(2-3LL) MIN/MAX 25OCT-25NOV
NO BAGGED RICE
M/V XIN YI HAI 16
FLAG:CHINA
IMO NUMBER: 9615664
TYPE OF VESSEL:BULK CARRIER/SINGLE-DECK
YEAR/MONTH OF BUILT:JUNE 2011 ZHEJIANG ZHENGHE SHIP BUILDING CO.,LTD
CLASS:CCS
GRT/NRT:32964/19142
SUEZ GRT/NRT: 33803.71/29342.31
SUMMER DEADWEIGHT/MAX DRAFT AND CORRESPONDING TPC
56805.9MT/12.8M/58.8MT/CM
LOA 189.99 M/BEAM 32.26 M  DEPTH MOULDED:18M
HEIGHT FM KEEL TO THE HIGHTEST POINT: 46.25M
DISTANCE FROM WATERLINE TO TOP OF HATCH COAMING:20.5M
5 HOLDS/5 HATCHES
HOLD CAPACITY: TOTAL GRAIN(CBM)/BALE(CBM)-71614.10/69929.61
H.COVER: HYDRAULIC FOLDING TYPE
4 X 30 MT  CRANE/4 X 6—12CBM3 GRABBER
SPEED/CONSUMPTION:
IN PORT:
IDLE:ABOUT 4.0MT IFO 380CST + 0.1MT MGO PER DAY OF 24 CONSECUTIVE HOURS
WORKING:ABOUT 4.5MT(FOR A/E) + 1.5MT(FOR BOILER) IFO 380CST+ 0.1MT MGO PER DAY OF 24 CONSECUTIVE HOURS SUBJECT TO WORKLOAD
AT SEA:
ABOUT 12.00KNOTS (BALLAST) ON ABOUT 20.0MT IFO 380CST + ABOUT   0.1 MT MGO
PER DAY OF 24 CONSECUTIVE HOURS,
